title: Trump Picks Donald Jr's Fiancee Kimberly Guilfoyle As Ambassador To Greece
content: US President-elect Donald Trump has picked Kimberly Guilfoyle, a former Fox News host turned political fundraiser and - more pointedly - the fiancee of his son Donald Jr, as the next United States ambassador to Greece.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump has picked Kimberly Guilfoyle, a former Fox News host turned political fundraiser and - more pointedly - the fiancee of his son Donald Jr, as the next United States ambassador to Greece.

title: Arctic's Dramatic Changes: Worrying Trends In Snow, Ice, Wildfires And More
content: The Arctic can feel like a far-off place, disconnected from daily life if you aren't one of the 4 million people who live there. Yet, the changes underway in the Arctic as temperatures rise can profoundly affect lives around the world.
summary: The Arctic can feel like a far-off place, disconnected from daily life if you aren't one of the 4 million people who live there. Yet, the changes underway in the Arctic as temperatures rise can profoundly affect lives around the world.

title: Witness Recounts When US CEO's Alleged Killer Was Spotted At McDonald's
content: A McDonald's staff is credited with the breakthrough in the manhunt that followed the murder of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson.
summary: A McDonald's staff is credited with the breakthrough in the manhunt that followed the murder of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson.

title: South Korea Leader Attempts Suicide Using Underwear Over Failed Martial Law
content: Kim Yong-hyun, the former South Korean Defence Minister Kim Yong-hyun accused of playing a lead role in the failed imposition of martial law on December 3, tried to commit suicide inside a detention centre on Wednesday.
summary: Kim Yong-hyun, the former South Korean Defence Minister Kim Yong-hyun accused of playing a lead role in the failed imposition of martial law on December 3, tried to commit suicide inside a detention centre on Wednesday.

title: Rebel Leader Jolani's Message To The World As Israel, Turkey Pound Syria
content: As new transitional Prime Minister Mohammad al-Bashir took charge and called for "stability and calm" in Syria, Israel carried out over 350 airstrikes targeting weapons stockpiles and strategic infrastructure in the Middle Eastern country.
summary: As new transitional Prime Minister Mohammad al-Bashir took charge and called for "stability and calm" in Syria, Israel carried out over 350 airstrikes targeting weapons stockpiles and strategic infrastructure in the Middle Eastern country.

title: 75 Indians Evacuated From Syria As Rebels Take Over, Now In Lebanon
content: At least 75 Indians have been evacuated from war-torn Syria where the rebels have toppled the Bashar al-Assad government and are set to form a government on their own.
summary: At least 75 Indians have been evacuated from war-torn Syria where the rebels have toppled the Bashar al-Assad government and are set to form a government on their own.

title: China's Naval Deployments In Line With Other Large Drills, Says US
content: China's naval deployments in the East China Sea and South China Sea are elevated but consistent with other large exercises in the past, a U.S. military official said on Tuesday, speaking on condition of anonymity.
summary: China's naval deployments in the East China Sea and South China Sea are elevated but consistent with other large exercises in the past, a U.S. military official said on Tuesday, speaking on condition of anonymity.

title: Over 100, Mostly Civilians, Killed In Two Days In Sudan Bombardments
content: At least 127 people, mostly civilians, were killed in Sudan on Monday and Tuesday by barrel bombs and shelling from the warring sides, rights activists said.
summary: At least 127 people, mostly civilians, were killed in Sudan on Monday and Tuesday by barrel bombs and shelling from the warring sides, rights activists said.

title: Israel's Netanyahu Rejects "Ridiculous" Charges At Corruption Trial
content: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu dismissed corruption charges against him as 'ridiculous' in court on Tuesday, becoming the country's first sitting premier to face criminal trial.
summary: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu dismissed corruption charges against him as 'ridiculous' in court on Tuesday, becoming the country's first sitting premier to face criminal trial.

title: Syria's New Transitional PM Calls For Stability And Calm
content: Syria's new transitional prime minister on Tuesday said it was time for "stability and calm" in the country, two days after longtime president Bashar al-Assad was toppled by rebels in a lightning offensive.
summary: Syria's new transitional prime minister on Tuesday said it was time for "stability and calm" in the country, two days after longtime president Bashar al-Assad was toppled by rebels in a lightning offensive.

title: Syrian Rebels Say Take Control Of Eastern City Of Deir Ezzor
content: Syrian rebels who ousted president Bashar al-Assad said on Tuesday that they had taken the eastern city of Deir Ezzor, while a war monitor confirmed Kurdish forces had withdrawn.
summary: Syrian rebels who ousted president Bashar al-Assad said on Tuesday that they had taken the eastern city of Deir Ezzor, while a war monitor confirmed Kurdish forces had withdrawn.

title: US Technical Advantage Over China Shrinking, Warns American Commander
content: The US Indo-Pacific Commander, Admiral Samuel Paparo, expressed confidence in the US military's ability to defeat China in the Pacific. However, he warned that the US technical advantage over China is rapidly shrinking.
summary: The US Indo-Pacific Commander, Admiral Samuel Paparo, expressed confidence in the US military's ability to defeat China in the Pacific. However, he warned that the US technical advantage over China is rapidly shrinking.

title: "Will Respond If...": Netanyahu Warns New Syrian Regime On Ties With Iran
content: Stating that Israel has "no intention of interfering" in Syria's internal affairs, PM Benjamin Netanyahu has warned to take "necessary" measures if the current regime allows Iran to re-establish itself in Syria or transfers weapons to Hezbollah.
summary: Stating that Israel has "no intention of interfering" in Syria's internal affairs, PM Benjamin Netanyahu has warned to take "necessary" measures if the current regime allows Iran to re-establish itself in Syria or transfers weapons to Hezbollah.

title: Israeli Army Says Conducted About 480 Strikes In Syria In 48 hours
content: The Israeli military said Tuesday that it conducted about 480 strikes over the past 48 hours on strategic military targets in Syria, days after the ouster of president Bashar al-Assad.
summary: The Israeli military said Tuesday that it conducted about 480 strikes over the past 48 hours on strategic military targets in Syria, days after the ouster of president Bashar al-Assad.

title: 75 Indians Evacuated From War-Torn Syria
content: India on Tuesday evacuated 75 Indian nationals from Syria, two days after rebel forces overthrew President Bashar Assad's authoritarian government.
summary: India on Tuesday evacuated 75 Indian nationals from Syria, two days after rebel forces overthrew President Bashar Assad's authoritarian government.

title: Outgoing US President Biden Says Trump Economic Plan Will Be "Disaster"
content: Outgoing US President Joe Biden on Tuesday branded his successor Donald Trump's economic plans a "disaster" in a speech hailing his own legacy in office.
summary: Outgoing US President Joe Biden on Tuesday branded his successor Donald Trump's economic plans a "disaster" in a speech hailing his own legacy in office.

title: In Pics: Top 10 Guinness World Records Broken In 2024
content: Sadly, Kevin's life was cut short just days after receiving this accolade. He passed away during surgery after falling ill. He had taken the record over from the Great Dane Zeus. He was 3 ft 5.18 in (1.046 m) tall.
summary: Sadly, Kevin's life was cut short just days after receiving this accolade. He passed away during surgery after falling ill. He had taken the record over from the Great Dane Zeus. He was 3 ft 5.18 in (1.046 m) tall.

title: Syrian President Bashar al-Assad In Russia, Confirms Senior Moscow Official
content: A senior Russian official told US broadcaster NBC on Tuesday that deposed Syrian leader Bashar al-Assad is being hosted in Russia, in the government's first confirmation of the situation.
summary: A senior Russian official told US broadcaster NBC on Tuesday that deposed Syrian leader Bashar al-Assad is being hosted in Russia, in the government's first confirmation of the situation.

title: Scientists From India, A Telescope In Chile, And An Astronomical Discovery
content: Astronomers from India have made an intriguing discovery in a unique tri-star solar system located 489 light years from Earth. The discovery will help astrophysicists get a better understanding of planetary formations.
summary: Astronomers from India have made an intriguing discovery in a unique tri-star solar system located 489 light years from Earth. The discovery will help astrophysicists get a better understanding of planetary formations.

title: Brazilian President Lula's Long History Of Health Woes
content: Brazil's 79-year-old President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva, who is recovering from emergency surgery after suffering an intracranial hemorrhage, has a long history of health problems and mishaps.
summary: Brazil's 79-year-old President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva, who is recovering from emergency surgery after suffering an intracranial hemorrhage, has a long history of health problems and mishaps.
